Contributor: Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.; Roberts & Leete, printer.;
Note: "Poster No. 67" appears on the bottom of the poster. Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to men to enlist because it is dangerous to delay when your country needs you. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 67.

Title: Men, to delay is dangerous
